title: Neighboring Landowners & Key Supplier
description: Our relationship is primarily defined by our shared land ownership in Cannaregio and Castello, and more recently, by our direct business dealings. I have active markup_buy contracts with you for essential resources like small boats and porter equipment, which are crucial for the Public Dock I manage. While our trust score of 50 indicates a foundational level of reliability, the current 'resource not for sale' problems at the Public Dock highlight a critical supply chain issue that needs to be addressed collaboratively. Our shared background as Cittadini and proximity in business could foster a more robust partnership.
